mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_CLASS_DETAIL JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo } ORDER BY LECTURE_NO DESC

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, PROF_EMAIL, PROF_NAME, PROF_NO, CLASS_IMG FROM TB_ATTENDANCE JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_PROFESSOR USING(PROF_NO) WHERE STD_NO=#{sNo} GROUP BY CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, PROF_EMAIL, PROF_NAME, PROF_NO, CLASS_IMG

SELECT CLASS_TYPE, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_NO, START_DATE, STD_NO, COUNT(ATTENDANCE), COUNT(ASSIGNMENT), COUNT(WEEK) FROM TB_ATTENDANCE JOIN TB_CLASS USING (CLASS_NO) WHERE WEEKDATE BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'IW')) AND TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'IW')) AND STD_NO= #{sNo} GROUP BY CLASS_NO, STD_NO, CLASS_TYPE, CLASS_NAME, START_DATE

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, CREDIT, PROF_NAME, PROF_LAB, PROF_EMAIL, CLASS_SUMMARY, CLASS_GOAL, LEC_METHOD, EVAL_METHOD, ASSIGNMENT, LEC_EXPERIMENT, RELATED_LEC, LEC_TEXTBOOK, EXAM_POINTS, ASSIGN_POINTS, ATTEND_POINTS FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN LP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo}
SELECT LECTURE_NO,LECTURE_NAME,LECTURE_REFERENCE,LECTURE_EXPLANATION FROM TB_CLASS JOIN TB_CLASS_DETAIL USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO =#{classNo} ORDER BY LECTURE_NO ASC

SELECT * FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_DETAIL CD USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(D.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo}

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, CREDIT, PROF_NAME, PROF_LAB, PROF_EMAIL, CLASS_SUMMARY, CLASS_GOAL, LEC_METHOD, EVAL_METHOD, ASSIGNMENT, LEC_EXPERIMENT, RELATED_LEC, LEC_TEXTBOOK FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN LP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE PROF_NO=#{pNo}

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, CLASS_SUMMARY FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN LP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE PROF_NO=#{pNo}

SELECT * FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_DETAIL CD USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D ON(D.DEPT_NO = C.DEPT_NO)
SELECT LECTURE_NO,LECTURE_NAME,LECTURE_REFERENCE,LECTURE_EXPLANATION FROM TB_CLASS JOIN TB_CLASS_DETAIL USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO =#{classNo} ORDER BY LECTURE_NO ASC

SELECT CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, CLASS_TYPE, CREDIT, PROF_NAME, PROF_LAB, PROF_EMAIL, CLASS_SUMMARY, CLASS_GOAL, LEC_METHOD, EVAL_METHOD, ASSIGNMENT, LEC_EXPERIMENT, RELATED_LEC, LEC_TEXTBOOK FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_LECTURE_PLAN LP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo} AND PROF_NO=#{pNo}

UPDATE TB_LECTURE_PLAN SET CLASS_SUMMARY=#{classSummary}, CLASS_GOAL=#{classGoal}, LEC_METHOD=#{lecMethod}, EVAL_METHOD=#{evalMethod}, ASSIGNMENT=#{assignment}, LEC_EXPERIMENT=#{lecExperiment}, RELATED_LEC=#{relatedLec}, LEC_TEXTBOOK=#{lecTextbook}, EXAM_POINTS=#{examPoints}, ASSIGN_POINTS=#{assignmentPoints}, ATTEND_POINTS=#{attendancePoints} WHERE CLASS_NO=#{classNo}
SELECT * FROM TB_CLASS C JOIN TB_DEPARTMENT D USING(DEPT_NO) JOIN TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR CP USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN TB_PROFESSOR P ON(P.PROF_NO = CP.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE PROF_NO = #{pNo}
SELECT * FROM TB_CLASS_DETAIL JOIN TB_CLASS USING(CLASS_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo } ORDER BY LECTURE_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CLASS_DETAIL SET LECTURE_NAME = #{lecName}, LECTURE_REFERENCE = #{lecReference}, LECTURE_VIDEO = #{lecVideo}, LECTURE_EXPLANATION =#{lecExplanation}, LECTURE_ATTENDANCE = DEFAULT,LECTURE_LEARNINGRATE = DEFAULT,CLASS_ATTENDEES = DEFAULT,LECTURE_VIDEO_CREATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE LECTURE_NO = #{lecNo}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TB_PROF_TEST P WHERE PROF_NO = #{pNo}

SELECT TEST_NO, TEST_TYPE, TEST_TITLE, OPENDATE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, TEST_TIME, CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, PROF_NO,lp.EXAM_POINTS/2 FROM TB_PROF_TEST join tb_lecture_plan lp using(class_no) WHERE PROF_NO = #{pNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PROF_TEST SET TEST_TITLE=#{tTitle}, OPENDATE= (to_date(#{openDate},'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI')), STARTDATE=#{startDate}, ENDDATE=#{endDate}, TEST_TIME=#{tTime} WHERE TEST_NO = #{tNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_TEST WHERE TEST_NO= #{tNo} ORDER BY QID DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_TEST SET TEST_NO =#{tNo}, QUESTION_NO = #{qNo}, QUESTION_TITLE = #{qTitle}, QUESTION_CONTENT1 = #{qContent1}, QUESTION_CONTENT2 = #{qContent2}, QUESTION_CONTENT3 = #{qContent3}, QUESTION_CONTENT4 =#{qContent4}, QUESTION_ANSWER = #{qAnswer}, QUESTION_WORTH = #{qWorth} WHERE QID = #{qId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_TEST WHERE QID =#{qId}
SELECT * FROM TB_TEST WHERE QID= #{qId} ORDER BY QID DESC
mapper.insert:
insert INTO TB_TEST( TEST_NO, CLASS_NO, CLASS_NAME, QUESTION_NO, QUESTION_TITLE, QUESTION_CONTENT1, QUESTION_CONTENT2, QUESTION_CONTENT3, QUESTION_CONTENT4, QUESTION_ANSWER, QUESTION_WORTH, PROF_NO, QID )SELECT A.* , SEQ_QID.NEXTVAL FROM(
select #{item.tNo} AS TEST_NO, #{item.cNo} AS CLASS_NO, #{item.cName} AS CLASS_NAME, #{item.qNo} AS QUESTION_NO, #{item.qTitle} AS QUESTION_TITLE, #{item.qContent1} AS QUESTION_CONTENT1, #{item.qContent2} AS QUESTION_CONTENT2, #{item.qContent3} AS QUESTION_CONTENT3, #{item.qContent4} AS QUESTION_CONTENT4, #{item.qAnswer} AS QUESTION_ANSWER, #{item.qWorth} AS QUESTION_WORTH, #{item.pNo} AS PROF_NO
from dual
)A
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM TB_HOMEWORK WHERE PROF_NO = #{pNo}
select * from tb_class join TB_CLASS_PROFESSOR using(class_no) join TB_DEPARTMENT using (dept_no) where PROFESSOR_NO =#{pNo}
